scenario.name: oa_exchange
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru;lr> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com;lr> From: testuser <sip:testuser@record.route.test.ru>;tag=[$local_tag] To: [$cdpn] <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:testuser@record.route.test.ru;transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=record_route_test 200000 200000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test1 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru;lr> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com;lr> [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru;lr> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com;lr> [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:testuser@record.route.test.ru;transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=record_route_test 200000 200001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Test1 t=0 0 c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru;lr> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com;lr> [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test1.domain.ru:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-19 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] test2.domain.com:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-12385-1-20 Record-Route: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];lr> Record-Route: <sip:test1.domain.ru;lr> Record-Route: <sip:test2.domain.com;lr> From: testuser <sip:testuser@record.route.test.ru>;tag=[$local_tag] To: [$cdpn] <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:testuser@record.route.test.ru;transport=udp> Max-Forwards: 70 [authentication] Require: 100rel Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
